attributes.review: I was literally 👩🏽‍💻 watching my jojo 🍒✨ and see this on my page 📃 I downloaded it to see a ✨⭐️crusty cheeseball 😬🤭 I would rather get a hole in my stomach 🍩 or fight a 🧛vampire than look at this ✨😔 thank you for your time 🥰

attributes.review: I’ve been waiting for days and the app still hasn’t downloaded. But there was a pop up saying the trump administration was preparing to deport me and my family. Very uncool. 0 stars if I could give it. Horrible app.

attributes.review: This app took DAYS!! to download!! Not only that but it never worked!! All I ever got was a loading screen. But that’s not even the worst of it, because of this app MY INFO WAS GIVEN TO CHINA!! Sad to say I no longer support trump after this experience 😓😓😓

attributes.review: I thought this app would be a nice addition, however it made my phone act very weird and I had to delete it, because it made me uncomfy. Wish I could give it 0 stars to be honest.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review:
Someone recommended this app to me so I decided to try it. WORST MISTAKE OF MY ENTIRE LIFE!!!! First of all it smelled liked burnt Cheetos (the orange ones)

Then my phone got glitched and it took 56 days to get better

attributes.review: This app is worse than joe Biden’s dementia. I’m honestly offended by how bad it is that it’s making me consider not voting for trump. I’d honestly rather get coronavirus than have to deal with the loads of imperfections this app has. This in NO WAY is making America great again!
attributes.title: worst

attributes.review: I thought the reviews were a lie but I went on vacation for a 69 weeks & get back &it was still downloading & the second it FINALLY downloaded it cracked my phone screen & hissed at me!!!!! If I regret anything in my life it’s downloading this app.
